700686f-a.title: Bronx: Burke Avenue - Cruger Avenue
700686f-a.text:
Burke Ave., east from (No. 717) and including Cruger Ave., to but
not including Bronxwood Ave. The view is from the lower end of the
uptown platform of the Burke Ave. elevated station of the II.R.T. subway,
on White Plains Road. This area was formerly the J.T. Adee estate.
About 1917.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
700686f-a.folder: Burke Avenue & Cruger Avenue, Bronx, NY
